entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
